description: Creates an opted out destination phone number in the opt-out list. If the destination phone number isn't valid or if the specified opt-out list doesn't exist, an error is returned.

parameters.name: OptOutListName
parameters.description: The OptOutListName or OptOutListArn to add the phone number to.

parameters.name: OptedOutNumber
parameters.description: The phone number to add to the OptOutList in E.164 format.

nested_items.name: OptOutListArn
nested_items.description: The OptOutListArn that the phone number was removed from.

nested_items.name: OptOutListName
nested_items.description: The OptOutListName that the phone number was removed from.

nested_items.name: OptedOutNumber
nested_items.description: The phone number that was added to the OptOutList.

nested_items.name: OptedOutTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time that the phone number was added to the OptOutList, in UNIX epoch time format.

nested_items.name: EndUserOptedOut
nested_items.description: This is true if it was the end user who requested their phone number be removed.
